# Ingredients
- 400 g dried wheat or egg noodles
- 1/4 cup hoisin sauce
- 2 tbsp soy sauce 
- 1 tbsp sesame oil
- 2 tsp honey 
- Vegetable oil
- 6 garlic cloves
- 6 green onions
- 4 tbsp toasted sesame seeds

# Instructions
## 1 - Prep
- Finely chop garlic
- Slice green onions, separate white and green parts

## 2 - Make the sauce
- Mix hoisin, soy sauce, sesame oil, and honey in a small bowl
- Set aside

## 3 - Cook noodles
- Cook the noodles in salted boiling water until al dente
- Drain and rinse to cool
- Set aside

## 4 - Cook sauce / noodles
- Heat oil in a large skillet
- Add garlic and white parts of green onion, cook until fragrant
- Quickly pour in the sauce and add the noodles, tossing to coat
- Let the noodles cook undisturbed until the bottom turns crispy, 2 to 3 minutes
- Season to taste

## 5 - Serve
- Top with sesame seeds and green onion
